quest.name: Out of Place
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
This well-meaning mentor would ask for your help with unfinished business.
objectives: Survey the designated areas and slay the anemone should it appear.
Deliver the anemone corpse to the well-meaning mentor.

dialogue.name: MENTOR03452
dialogue.text: Your travels have led you back to Slitherbough, I see. Your timing is fortuitous. Preparations for the anemone hunt are complete. If you are of a mind to join me, your aid would be most appreciated.

dialogue.name: MENTOR03452
dialogue.text: It was last seen in the southwestern region of Cleric. The hunt will prove difficult, however, as that is where the Children chose to build their spiders' nest.

dialogue.name: MENTOR03452
dialogue.text: Tread lightly, and do not hesitate to strike it down on sight. I only ask that you retrieve its corpse should you find it first.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You see no sign of the anemone. Perhaps you should search elsewhere.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You find the corpse of an animal, but there are no signs of a struggle. Perhaps it was killed with poison...

dialogue.name: MENTOR03452
dialogue.text: You are returned. I hope you had better luck than I.

dialogue.name: MENTOR03452
dialogue.text: <sigh> Would that there was another way, but the threat it posed to the Greatwood could not be ignored.

dialogue.name: MENTOR03452
dialogue.text: Mark my words: this will not happen again.
